metadata.title: Florida Oasis
metadata.description:
Designed as a complete rejuvenation with a high-level of customization, this 1990’s home takes on a new life in the modern age of art and accessibility. Updated with an emphasis on nuanced, natural detailing, this organic inspired oasis now features an exotic, Wild Agate island with glass tile splash and walls. Further accompanied by the addition of a custom sheet metal range hood, this kitchen was carefully crafted to ignite an inspired coastal comfort with an infusion of industrial elegance. Continued throughout the rest of the home, a beautiful beach-swept essence maintains, amplified abstractly by entertainment elements.

Treated as a form of interactive art, a glass tile surround fireplace, custom pool table, and accessories were also added. Envisioned to enhance the 20’ ceilings, unique lighting fixtures ranging from modern to vintage connect and compliment through the cohesion of movement. Finally, finished through intellectual artistry like a sculpture niche with specialty lighting, this high-brow hideaway gives way to gorgeous views that are embodied in this escape-worthy elevation.
metadata.rooms: exterior, foyer, living-room, dining-room, kitchen, family-room, bathroom, master-bedroom, bedroom
metadata.tags: metal, lighting, glass, art-collection, entertainment, floors, stone, wood, window-treatments, custom-furniture, cabinetry, tile, upholstery, bar

metadata.title: Escape the World Master Suite
metadata.description:
Sprawling and sophisticated, this master suite was designed to take you away. The bedroom features a champagne chic color palette, paired with Swarovski crystal, embellished silk, and custom bedding. Sumptuous statements extend to the ceiling with cast plaster interlocking moldings, while fluid function takes shape in the form of an added built-in storage desk area.

Building on the adjacent elegance in the bedroom, this master suite is completed with the muse-worthy master bathroom. Designed to help you unwind, this section of the suite features heated mosaic marble floors and an inlaid laser cut marble accent wall. This polished and personal paradise continues into the LED lit shower niche, outfitted with a rain head spa shower head and seat with a linear drain detail. Customization compliments this space though detailed cabinets and vanity chair with casters. Finished by luxe lighting, the addition of a Murano glass chandelier radiates from the ceiling like a catalyst for opulent excellence in this sanctuary-like suite.
metadata.tags: lighting, custom-furniture, window-treatments, upholstery, bedding, cabinetry, floors, tile, stone, glass

metadata.title: Contemporary Suburban Living
metadata.description:
Contemporary makes a consciously chic reemergence in this complete renovation. The kitchen features custom, quarter sawn mahogany cabinets, crafted with horizontal grain doors and drawers. Functionality pairs with impeccable design through integrated glass and tile accents on the doors, backsplash, and walls. Built from the framework up, warmth welcomes you to this modern, mealtime haven.

An infectious energy of vibrant avant-garde art carries you to the bar area, where inlaid porcelain tile is surrounded by beautiful brazilian walnut. The bar itself is custom, as are the cabinetry and storage accentuated by inlaid copper. Tactile and of its time, a hammered copper sink was also incorporated. The warmth of the metal is mirrored in the living room with the addition of a two-sided, natural gas fireplace flanked by porcelain and inlaid glass, as well as textured porcelain. Custom art glass doors invites you into the study, as a dramatic, sculptural staircase gracefully guides you to the foyer and dining room. Outfitted with a honey-onyx floor and laser-cut, decorative metal panels, these contemporary compliments complete this modern home.
metadata.rooms: kitchen, dining-room, recreation-room, living-room, office, bathroom
metadata.tags: glass, cabinetry, stone, tile, lighting, art-collection, floors, entertainment, custom-furniture, doors, metal, wood, bar

metadata.title: Family Beach Retreat
metadata.description: Customization and personalization elevate this unique shore property. Adding designed warmth that helps delineate the dining area from the open floor plan, a painted area rug was carefully crafted to allow free access and enhance functionality. Sweeping views of the ocean are visible from a built in window seat, perfectly placed in the master bedroom. Outfitted with sights and storage, the seaside vibrates into a blue, woven, wood wall treatment. Embodying a nautical and nuanced essence, the bed is bound in wrapped leather for a finishing touch that’s both one of a kind and defined with articulated authenticity.
metadata.rooms: office, living-room, dining-room, kitchen, outside, bedroom, dressing-room
metadata.tags: upholstery, art-collection, lighting, floors, custom-furniture, bedding, cabinetry

metadata.title: Handsome Transitional Home
metadata.description:
Adorned to be adored, this home was customized to reflect the lifestyle and taste of its new owner. Designed with new detailing, custom metal railings along the steps and second floor overlook, lead you the guest rooms & living space.

With an inverted layout, the first level features a painted floor to visually separate the dining area from the open space that adjoins it to the foyer. The adjacent office is outfitted with custom mahogany doors, the specialty glass and custom built-in cabinets transform this personal office space for optimal function. Wall treatments, drapery and lighting are all new additions, added to enhance the living area. To further personalize the space, a customized, surround fireplace was also incorporated in the living area, while the master bathroom is completed with updated counters and a shower seat crafted of quartz. Seen in two separate rooms are custom paintings by Joanne to truly give the client each detail they desire.
metadata.rooms: office, living-room, dining-room, kitchen, master-bedroom, bedroom, foyer, bathroom
metadata.tags: entertainment, window-treatments, custom-furniture, art-collection, stone, lighting, glass, floors, cabinetry, metal, doors

metadata.title: Joanne Balaban Olen Fine Art

hero.name: Tower of Flowers
hero.details: (3) 18" x 18" and (2) 18" x 9" each piece contains 2 tempered glass panels, acrylic paint, and framed in metal, 5 of 5

metadata.description:
Extremely drawn to color as far back as I can remember. Experimenting with as many materials as I could, immersing myself in the artistic and design processes, I have honed these skills for decades in my professional life as an Interior Designer. When looking for creative and immersive, dynamic and thoughtful ways to cover large multi story surfaces, I developed the format for my multi-panel glass paintings. This format allows me to express color in a pure yet evocative way, translucent, and dimensional. The pieces shown are meant to enhance your living and working spaces with soothing liquid color. Each individual painting consists of two panels of tempered glass, acrylic and metal paint, framed in metal unless otherwise noted.

Commissions welcome.

Let your mind wander and enjoy the ride.

metadata.title: Spa & Pool Area
metadata.description: Entering from the exterior pool area or Al’s Place, this sanctuary has everything needed for complete relaxation. This includes a commodious steam shower with glass block window & extra deep lounging seat, inlayed glass tiles throughout, stone counters & makeup area, separate toilet room complete with it’s own urinal. A concealed laundry room with rear access to refill the towel cabinets from behind add convenience. Recessed and concealed cove lighting coffers lift the 9 foot ceilings even higher. Decorative elements include bamboo art glass doors & white stained glass bamboo themed light box.
metadata.tags: lighting, wood, tile, glass, cabinetry, stone, floors, custom-furniture

metadata.title: Regal Bedroom
metadata.description: Warmth & comfort make this sleeping, living, & relaxing space the perfect retreat. Enhanced with a custom granite fireplace,TV, media & storage cabinetry, as well as extensive additional wardrobe closets, this is a space you don’t want to leave & you can’t wait to come home to.

metadata.title: Mid-Century Modern Home
metadata.description: A complete renovation was required to bring this home up to current lifestyle & code standards. From inception through completion, this project required hands on project management, including selection of all interior & exterior finishes, selection & oversight of all contractors & artisans. A full make over was required, without sacrificing the flavor of the original Philadelphia architects, Carroll, Grisdale, & Van Alen designed home. From a new Geothermal HVAC system & solar ready roof, down to the door mats and everything in between. Original concrete floors were buffed & polished, new concrete floors were added in the additions,(the work space & art studio, as well as the kitchen & bathrooms). All of the original Nakashima furniture, 24 pieces, were refinished by Nakashima Studios & used through out. With few exceptions, reuse & repurposing of existing furnishings were employed. Extensive changes were made to lighting to highlight the artwork of the Owner, his family, & collected artists. The exterior Bluestone hardscaping & landscaping were revamped. Currently under renovation is the existing pool house.
metadata.rooms: library, living-room, dining-room, kitchen, master-bedroom, bedroom, bathroom, foyer, exterior, office
metadata.tags: concrete, cabinetry, custom-furniture, lighting, art-collection, stone, bedding, floors, glass, tile, patio, landscaping

metadata.title: Bar & Entertainment
metadata.description: A haven for fun, entertaining, and relaxation. With a custom bar, stained glass light box signage, pool table with built-in seating, multiple TV’s and media equipment, arcade games, poker table, and wine cellar, everyone wants to play at Al’s Place! LED lighting system enhances the extensive sports memorabilia collection. Cast glass back splash and stone counters add sparkle and dimension.
metadata.tags: wood, cabinetry, tile, lighting, upholstery, glass, floors, art-collection, custom-furniture, stone, entertainment, bar

metadata.title: Modern Dining Room
metadata.description: Niches display pieces of an art glass collection enhanced with fiber optic lighting. Custom furnishings include, a serving buffet with a handmade mosaic glass top, a Lemonwood inlayed dining table, leather seating, iron work transome, Murano blown glass drapery hardware, and metal mesh over satin draperies.
metadata.tags: art-collection, glass, lighting, window-treatments, metal, cabinetry, tile

metadata.title: A View From Above
metadata.description: Shown are custom iron with polished wood top stair railings and stairs. Decorative wall moldings enhance tapestries, entryway and family photo gallery. Embossed and hand painted friezes complement the crown moldings. All overlooking the stone archways into the dining and living room on one side, and the family room on the other.

metadata.title: Dining Room Wine Cellar
metadata.description: A wine lover delight, this dining room employs composition stone work at the entry and to enclose dual wine refrigerators with custom doors with ironwork inserts. The space includes built-in buffet storage, beamed ceiling, and hand painted wainscoting, wall finish and ceiling medallion. The effect is a European castle in a modern home.
metadata.tags: metal, stone, cabinetry, lighting, window-treatments, custom-furniture, millwork

metadata.title: Fun Family Room
metadata.description: This family room features an upholstered fireplace backdrop, with a distressed wood hand selected mantle, hand painted window treatment flags displaying the family crest, add to this beamed space. Granite counters facing the TV area allow for convenient serving or dining.
metadata.tags: window-treatments, custom-furniture, millwork, floors, upholstery, lighting, stone, millwork

metadata.title: Gentleman's Library
metadata.description: The coffered ceiling enhances the rooms height, and add depth & detail. Crown moldings hide drapery tops, draperies frame the view. Enter through Art glass custom arched doors. Built-in cabinetry to organizes everything. The wall treatment is reminiscent of a fine wool suit.

metadata.title: Sophisticated Ladies Closet & Dressing Room
metadata.description: Fantasy meets function in this beautifully appointed closet and dressing space. Dressing table augments custom storage cabinetry with window seats allows for everything to be organized and in it’s place. From jewelry to purses and everything in between, access to your favorite pieces is a snap.

metadata.title: Elegant Living Room
metadata.description: The composition stone arched entryway lures you in. The Swarovski crystal chandelier & drapery hold backs, mother of pearl fireplace backdrop (too pretty to hang art on), complex hand finished crown moldings & drapery pockets augmented by sheer drapery framing the outside view. Finalized with custom seating & a set of long horns.
metadata.tags: entertainment, millwork, custom-furniture, lighting, window-treatments, stone

metadata.title: His Room
metadata.description: Raw basement space was disguised to create this worlds apart Ambiance. Natural inlays of Paduk & Purple Heart woods accentuate the black stained straight grained Oak cabinetry in this theater & entertaining space. Bar area, concealed cigar smoke removal system, operational stained glass windows lit from within, hand forged side & cocktail tables, (with roll out ottomans for additional seating & foot comfort), and upholstered wall for excellent acoustics. Bathroom show is adjacent.

publication.title: Spectacular Homes of Greater Philadelphia & American Lifestyles

metadata.title: Musical Living Room
metadata.description: From the custom cabinetry, banquet with storage below, & Victorian style piano, to the faux wall & ceiling finishes, this musical living room invites you in. Additional Swarovski crystals, acquired for the chandelier manufacturer, were integrated into the window treatment.
